text: Regina Lee Hall (born December 12, 1970) is an American actress and comedian. She is best known for her leading roles, most recently in Girls Trip (2017), Little (2019) and Shaft (2019). She became known for her role as Brenda in the horror comedy Scary Movie (2000). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Washington, D.C. title: Regina Hall
